'''Dodoco's Beach Nap''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Dodoco's Beach Nap is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

Despite being a Seating item, the Furnishing cannot be sat on.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
